title: Actually Can't Play
body:
So after the most recent patch I tried to mess around with Urgot in a practice tool. Once I loaded in it gave me an immediate "attempting to reconnect".
This doesn't go away for like 20s-1m and even after it goes away I cannot complete any actions ingame. I can't Walk, Buy items, Use or level abilities, etc.
I know it's not my connection since everything else is completely fine. May be a server problem.

replies.body: Your connection to the game server sounds like it's unstable, so it can't communicate what's happening in-game.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help with fixing that up!
